modName: ULTIMATE SKYRIM - AtoZ GUIDE to get the most IMMERSIVE and REALISTIC Skyrim
summary: This is my list of active mods (more than 150 mods), the most immersive, without god mods, unrealistic mods or not lore-friendly mods. All compatible between them!
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/402/usgz.jpg/][img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/8704/usgz.jpg[/img][/url]




This is my personal list of active mods (more than 150 mods), it is for me the most immersive, without god mods, unrealistic mods or not lore-friendly mods.
Just necessary best of their category mods to avoid having too much of it "on", for gameplay, sounds, graphics, weapons, armors etc. For beginners or if you want a total RPG/survival/realistic game, install all of this mods, and after, if you wish, install fantasy ones ;)

Mods that are missing here are just not in my personal taste and/or less complete than others here, no offence. No player armors/weapons mods here, I don't like when NPCs can't wear them too, it's cheating and brake immersion.

Some other mods are not here because they have links on the main page mod from the ultimate list, other great mods are directly integrated in mods here. Some mods integrate compatibility patch inside file, some speak about it with linked blue sentence or else on description page.

ALL of this mods are COMPATIBLE between them;) No CTD/bugs with all this mod "on".
BUT with lots of graphics mods "on" and with no enough memory (ram) your game can freeze when you enter a new zone, load, fast travel or load scripts etc.

Backup files if you doubt, read readme, uncheck autosave in game menu (use quick save), check for compatibility patches, change load order or uninstall mods if you freeze (or RAM?)!

Many of them have option customizer via in game menu.

I suggest to use manual installation (AFTER DL all mods and read everything here), to know exactly what is override/installed and where. Easier to have a clean install without bugs, specially when you uninstall something. No files of all of these mods override another one, except textures, meshes etc like graphics mods.

INSTALLATION advice at the end of the page.

Install by category (graphics, sounds, items etc), and test your game after all mods from a category are installed. Then continue. Install load order process is common sense. You have LOAD ORDER screens at the end of the page (because BOSS can make a mess and then you can't choose which mods is first with another mod, it's possible to do redo the reload order after , but I prefer to install each category and after choose the most important mod in load order with NMM and continue). Merged Esp is needed for leveled lists from weapons and armos etc, last in the loader order, but before any edited followers. Without merged esp the last mod loaded will "erase" same leveled lists from others!

Read the....Readme of all mods!!!!!

And repeat=> Read all the page, Backup files if you doubt, read readme of mods, uncheck autosave in game menu (use quick save), check for compatibility patches, change load order or uninstall mods if you freeze (or RAM?)!


----Changelog----

6.1
Add more plants and decoration to Whiterun (compatible with Whiterunmore houses)
Change to beautiful new statues
Change beautiful new banners
Add first person view from SKSE
No names until you speak to somebody
New killmove mod
Change statics to container
Change statics wood to container, possibility to cut wood (like The Forest game)
Loot and degradation
Add cannabis
Add Guild maker
Add Wyrmstooth island and quests
Add movable furnitures
Add better imperial forts
Updated load order

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28467]ReProccer - Automated SkyRe patch generator[/url] Just install (prog needed to be able to see Skyre changes on other mods of armors, weapons etc)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29865]SUM - SkyProc Unified Manager[/url] Install, and Run SUM, in option BOSS uncheck to keep load order in screenshots below!, start patching by SUM.

33===>
New island!(npc, quests, villages, voiced etc):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994]Falskaar[/url]

34===>
New quests on new island:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25704]Wyrmstooth[/url]



[color=#ff0000]========PHYSICS========[/color]

1===>
Dead bodies have physic bones:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30947]Dead Body Collision Fix[/url]

2===>
More realistic corpse fall etc, customizable:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/601]Realistic Ragdolls and Force[/url]

3===>
Player can relax:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13931]Dovahkiin Relaxes Too[/url]

4===>
Can sit anywhere:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23179]Sit Anywhere[/url]

5==>
Animation for everything (actions of player):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51554]Animations[/url]

6===>
Female walking animation, customizable:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5053]Catwalk[/url]

7===>
Female sit animation, customizable:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15674]Sit animation[/url]

8===>
Drinking fountain:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24282]Drinking Fountains of Skyrim[/url]

9===>
Play music with instruments and gain renown etc:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31680]Become a Bard[/url]

10===>
Sex, customizable:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10748]Animated Prostitution - Skyrim[/url]

11===>
Taking torch from walls:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8070]Dynamic Torches[/url]

12===>
Take lanterns for light:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17416]Wearable Lanterns[/url]

13===>
Longer death camera, many option, funny when you fall from mountain, customizable:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/242]Death Cam Duration Options[/url]

14===>
Better animation for sprint, jump and run:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34960]Run Sprint and Jump[/url]

15===>
Equipable map:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4331]Equipable Map[/url]

16===>
Possibility to cut trees, rocks, lots of dynamic things (compatible with Frostfall efc):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32448]Dynamic Things - Woodpiles and Barrels and More Oh My[/url]

17===>
Move anything:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25068]Placeable Statics - Move Anything[/url]
and
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3562]More Interactive Items - Grab Moveable Statics[/url]

18===>
NPCs can loot, weapons degradation:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55677]Loot and Degradation[/url]



[color=#6aa84f]========FIRST LOAD ORDER========[/color]

Activated mods order before merging esp with Wyre Bash:

New load order:

[url=http://www.noelshack.com/2014-34-1408890249-lo1.jpg][img]http://image.noelshack.com/minis/2014/34/1408890249-lo1.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.noelshack.com/2014-34-1408890386-lo2.jpg][img]http://image.noelshack.com/minis/2014/34/1408890386-lo2.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.noelshack.com/2014-34-1408890415-lo3.jpg][img]http://image.noelshack.com/minis/2014/34/1408890415-lo3.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.noelshack.com/2014-34-1408890434-lo4.jpg][img]http://image.noelshack.com/minis/2014/34/1408890434-lo4.png[/img][/url]

Old load order but with explication at the end for last activation before start the game:
[url=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/18/lod5.jpg/][img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/7155/lod5.jpg[/img][/url]



[color=#6aa84f]======== THEN MERGED FILES/BASH FILE========[/color]

After setting the correct load order and activate the mods with NMM, the Merged Esp is needed for leveled lists from weapons and armors etc, last in the loader order, but before any edited followers and DON'T activate custom followers when you merge, activate them after the creation of the merged ESP and re-process

1/ Launch Wrye bash
2/ Find Bashed file.esp
3/ Right click on it
4/ Rebuilt patch
5/ Contine X 2
6/ Build patch
7/ OK and activate bash file

!!!!After the creation of the bashed esp, in NMM you will see desactivated mod, it's normal, they were merged, don't activate them and don't delete them in data, you still need them to rebuilt patch if you add another mod ;) !!!!


[color=#6aa84f]========RE-PROCESS for SkyRedone========[/color]
When you did the merged esp, launch the SUM program (don't check BOOS to keep the load order) for Skyredone and his reproccer with the merged esp "on".
ACTIVATE reprocessor in NMM after


[color=#6aa84f]========ACTIVATE LATEST ESP========[/color]
Activate the custom followers, maps and alternate start.

[color=#6aa84f]======== USEFUL INI PERF/GRAPHICS TWEAKS/BUG FIXES========[/color]

Boost and/or optimisation tweaks:
[url=http://www.rcrncommunity.com/five-quick-skyrim-tweaks-you-may-not-know]Read and may be do[/url]

Safety loading:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46465/?]Safety Load[/url]

Clean the script of a saved game:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52363/?]Save game script cleaner[/url]


===My old mods===
[url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/users/573956]Oblivion[/url] on the third icon "mods"
[url=http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/users/573956]Fallout 3[/url] on the third icon "mods"
[url=http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?447324-Next-Total-War-Game-Discussion]Medieval Total War 2[/url] in the first post signature after the poll


------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks to all modders from everywhere in the world to share with us their time and creativity! ;)

Uploaded with [url=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/url]
author: Brips

files.name: Ultimate Skyrim Guide
files.changelogHtml:
-Add more HUD info
-Add feast in skyrim
-Add Common Clothes
-Add better children
-Add children clothes
-Add lore weapons
-Add Animations
-Add New monsters
-Add Trades routes and global econnomy
-Add No snow under the roof
-Add gifts for everybody
-Add New island, Falskaar
-New load order
-New file, text, pictures

Old updates:
-Text updated
-Add SUM to keep load order with reproccer for SkyRe
-Add Helgen reborn
-Add Alt+tab 2 cursor bug fix
-Add Immersive bed animation
-Add butterfly and bugs diversity
-Add blocky face fix
-Add Crossbow fire sound
-Add run and sprint and jump animation
-Load order updated

-Add magic duel reborn
-Add BDYEB shields
-Add Enhanced Lights for RCRN or else
-Add upgraded weapons for enemies
-Add Rainbows and Shootings stars
-Rewrite the texts
-Sexy update load order screens
-New DL file

-Deleted mods, added ones
-Restructure the presentation and order
-New subdivision
-New load order screens
-New installation explication
-More comprehensible

Add more plants and decoration to Whiterun (compatible with Whiterunmore houses)
Change to beautiful new statues
Change beautiful new banners
Add first person view from SKSE
No names until you speak to somebody
New killmove mod
Change statics to container
Change statics wood to container, possibility to cut wood (like The Forest game)
Loot and degradation
Add cannabis
Add Guild maker
